name: Unnatural Darkness
description: A creeping darkness has covered the battlefield. During the daytime it almost seems as if night had fallen, the sun resembling more a full moon then a star.
effect:
- All Dark-Types gain +1 Priority.
- All attacks not originating from Dark, Fire or Ground-types reduce accuracy by 2.
- All moves that are Complete Heals in Sunny weather now only heal 1 HP.
